INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the undesirable effects, and especially of metabolic acidosis, of the acetylsalicylic acid in large doses and of the acetazolamide, due to decrease of the elimination of the acetylsalicylic acid by the acetazolamide
Increase of hemorrhagic events

CLASS.name: ANGIOTENSIN II RECEPTOR ANTAGONISTS or ANGIOTENSIN RECEPTOR BLOCKERS (ARBs)

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION:
For anti-inflammatory dosages of acetylsalicylic acid (>=1g per dose and/or >=3g per day) or for analgesic or antipyretic doses (>=500mg by dose and/or <3g per day):
Acute renal insufficiency with dehydrated patients, due to decrease of the glomerular filtration following a decrease of the synthesis of the renal prostaglandins. Furthermore, reduction of the antihypertensive effect.
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Hydrate the patient and monitor renal function at the beginning of treatment.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the risk of hemorrhage, especially in cases with a previous gastro duodenal ulcer.
INTERACTION.COMMENT: - anti-inflammatory doses of acetylsalicylic acid (>=1 g per dose and/or >= 3g per day)

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the risk of digestive system ulceration and hemorrhage.
INTERACTION.COMMENT: -with anti-inflammatory doses of acetylsalicylic acid (>=1g per dose and/or >=3g per day)

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the risk of hemorrhage due to addition of the platelet aggregation activities.
INTERACTION.COMMENT: -except in validated indications for this combination of drugs in acute coronary syndromes.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION:
With anti-inflammatory doses of acetylsalicylic acid (>=1g per dose and/or >=3g per day) or for analgesic or antipyretic doses (>=500 mg per dose and/or <3 g per day):
increase of the risk of digestive ulceration and hemorrhage

For anti-inflammatory doses of acetylsalicylic acid (>=1g per dose and/or >=3g per day) or for analgesic or antipyretic doses (>=500 mg per dose and/or <3 g per day):
Acute renal insufficiency in dehydrated patients, due to decrease of the glomerular filtration as a result of a decrease of the synthesis of the renal prostaglandins. Furthermore, reduction of the antihypertensive effect.
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Hydrate the patient and monitor renal function at the start of treatment.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the risk of hemorrhage
INTERACTION.COMMENT: -with anti-inflammatory doses of acetylsalicylic acid (>=1 g per dose and/or >3 g per day)

CLASS.name: LOW MOLECULAR WEIGHT HEPARINS AND RELATED DRUGS (CURATIVE DOSES AND/OR OLDER PATIENT)

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the risk of hemorrhage (inhibition of the platelet function and irritation of the gastro duodenal mucosa by the acetylsalicylic acid)
INTERACTION.COMMENT: -with anti-inflammatory doses of acetylsalicylic acid (>=1g per dose and/or >=3 g per day)

CLASS.name: LOW MOLECULAR WEIGHT HEPARINS AND RELATED DRUGS (PREVENTIVE DOSES)

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: The combination of medications acting at different levels of hemostasis increases the risk of bleeding. Thus, with patients under the age of 65, adding heparin in preventive doses to acetylsalicylic acid, whatever the dosage, must be taken into account by maintaining clinical monitoring and possibly biological monitoring.

DRUG.name: UNFRACTIONATED HEPARIN (CURATIVE DOSES AND/OR OLDER PATIENTS)

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the risk of hemorrhage (inhibition of the platelet function and irritation of the gastro duodenal mucosa by the acetylsalicylic acid)
INTERACTION.COMMENT: -with anti-inflammatory doses of acetylsalicylic acid (>=1g per dose and/or >=3 g per day)

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: The combination of medications acting at different levels of hemostasis increases the risk of bleeding. Thus, with patients under the age of 65, adding preventive doses of heparin or similar substances to acetylsalicylic acid, regardless of the dosage, must be taken into account by maintaining clinical monitoring and possibly biological monitoring

For anti-inflammatory doses of acetylsalicylic acid (>=1g per dose and/or >=3g per day) or for analgesic or antipyretic doses (>=500 mg per dose and/or <3 g per day):
Acute renal insufficiency in dehydrated patients, due to decreased glomerular filtration following a decrease of the synthesis of the renal prostaglandins. Furthermore, reduction of the antihypertensive effect.
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Hydrate the patient and monitor renal function at the start of treatment.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the risk of hemorrhage
Increase of the toxicity, especially hematological, of the methotrexate (decrease of its renal clearance by the acetylsalicylic acid)
Risk of increase of the toxicity of the pemetrexed (decrease of its renal clearance by the acetylsalicylic acid in anti-inflammatory doses).
INTERACTION.COMMENT: -in case of weak to moderate renal function

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Decrease of the uricosuric effect due to competition of the elimination of the uric acid at the level of the renal tubules
Increase of the risk of hemorrhage
Increase of the risk of hemorrhage due to addition of the platelet antiagregation actions
INTERACTION.COMMENT: --except for validated indications for this combination in acute coronary syndromes

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the risk of hemorrhage due to addition of the platelet antiagregation actions
INTERACTION.COMMENT: If administering the substances together cannot be avoided, strict clinical monitoring.
